message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a price of $18000. It's a great deal considering its value to you is $12000, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept $14000. I'm willing to come down to $16000. This is a fair price considering the value you place on the product and the time I've invested in it.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to go up to $15500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
